MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the FK3 postcode area of Grangemouth. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:11pm. Our emergency response team have now arrived at the Earls Road primary substation and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:45pm on Saturday, 27 March 2021
